abstractText: Water withdrawals, as referred to in this method, are the number and relative size of the water withdrawals in the stream reach (Lestelle et al., 2005). The purpose of this method is to identify and classify the potential risk for fish species to be entrained by withdrawals or injured by screening (Lestelle et al., 2005). In order to assess the significance of the withdrawal, data should be gathered during the month when withdrawals are the greatest.
title: Rapid Assessment Water Withdrawal v1.0
